        public void updateGame(GameMainDriver game)
                throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                       java.io.IOException
        creates a backup object by storing the data as serialized object in a file.
        Parameters:
        game - To save the current state of the game.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Exception in transforming the object into serilaizable
        java.io.IOException - Exception while handling the input and output to the file
